title: Поклик кохання
overview: The first love of classmates Anna and Andriy is overshadowed by Anna's involuntary betrayal. The lovers part ways - as they think, forever. Andriy becomes a professional military, while Anna builds a successful career and enjoys married life in Kyiv. Russian aggression changes everything once and for all. Both Andriy and Anna go through pain, suffering, loss of their loved ones, despair and hopelessness. Fate gives them the opportunity to start all over, but will Anna and Andriy manage to forgive past hurts and find love again?
